data.title: We are here, UNITED!
data.meta_description: To fulfill a shared dream of adding value to the language travel market and ed-tech space for good.
data.text:
Academia United grasps a culture that gives importance to innovation while embracing indispensable core values. The BODY of our culture consists of:

BOLDNESS: Innovation and change come with bold choices. We are not afraid to take risks and think outside the box.

OPENNESS: We believe in being direct and straight-to-the-point in our way of communication and this is precisely where we draw a strong line between success and failure. In addition, innovation and self-development require constant openness by bringing new ideas, methods, or changes to our horizon at all times.

DIVERSITY: We naturally coexist under the same roof, believing in the same dream, walking the same path regardless of ethnicity, race, religion, age, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, and social beliefs.

YOUTHFULNESS: We are agile. We are dynamic. We are enthusiastic. We are here, UNITED! Our soul and core values are surrounded by a uniquely structured dynamic feel where we learn, grow and prosper TOGETHER.

Customer-oriented: We don't just deliver for our customers but also exceed their expectations.

Self-development: We constantly grow ourselves and help each other grow as well through our collective passion for learning.

Diversity: We value diversity and inclusiveness formed with a family spirit as genuine as it could get.

Open communication: We believe in open communication and this is how we form our teams and base our relationships on.

Having an open mind: We create fun and always keep an open mind for our people and surroundings.

Being unique and having fun: We find joy in the work we create which could sometimes come with a little tweak of weirdness.

Determination: We are highly determined to ethically do whatever it takes to reach our goals.

Simplicity: We take simplicity quite seriously in every step and process we follow.

Modesty: We have always been modest and always will be.

Unity: We are here, UNITED!

Selim Dervish

Founder

Selim Dervish is the Founder and Director of Academia United. Being a local both in London and Istanbul, Dervish followed his passion of helping people and touching lives which led him to work in International Education. After working for multi-national blue-chip firms in London in various capacities, eventually, he founded Academia United in 2010 based in Istanbul, Turkey to offer market intelligence to industry players. He is now leading a dynamic team of young people with his knowledge and experience to elevate the language learning market and touch even more lives on the way...

Asil Can Dönmez

Administrative Executive

Asil Can Dönmez is our team’s Administrative Executive. After getting his highschool degree from Darüşşafaka, and an exchange year in Hungary, he decided to study Psychology at Dokuz Eylül University. After completing his undergraduate studies, Asil pursued his career in Business Administration. In addition to his excellent social skills, he has a passion for music and plays guitar and violin alongside singing. Sometimes he plays on the streets and bars in İzmir so if you run into him, be sure to request a song from him.

Akifcan Kara

Frontend Developer

Akifcan Kara is our Front-end Developer. Currently enrolled in the Computer Programming department at İzmir Yaşar University, he has a passion for anything that has to do with tech. He's into front-end, backend and mobile applications and his aim is to become a full-stack developer. He also has online courses where he teaches what he's learned so far about front-end operations. Being a huge Şebnem Ferah fan, his love for music is immense. He's also quite interested in martial arts.

Raşit Akyol

Senior Software Consultant

As a Marketing graduate, Raşit Akyol pursued his interest in computers, programming, and software coming from his early ages which eventually led him to start working as a Software Developer since 2010. With his proven knowledge and expertise in this field, he has been a part of the Academia United family since 2015 providing extensive consultancy and solving complex development problems with the rest of our team working on multiple scale software projects. As a devoted father of one named Devrim and one on the way at the time of writing this named Özgür, Raşit has found a new dimension to life thanks to the joys and excitements the boys bring to him and his family!

Can Çelik

Product Consultant

As a graduate from Civil Engineering Department of Istanbul Technical University with honours, Can is a truly sophisticated person with a strong technical background and a high level of curiosity to further learn and develop. Apart from his interest in mathematics, business, and driving scooters along the Bosphorus, Can is a true animal lover. Don’t be surprised if you see him feeding stray cats and dogs in the busiest streets of Istanbul! Right now, he is a graduate student in Property Development and working as a Product Consultant at Academia United.
